sentences.en: The hermit went on muttering, and gave no heed.
sentences.cn: 隐士继续念叨着，没有注意。

sentences.en: If your unconscious is saying don't take that job, go on that date, poke that skunk—take heed.
sentences.cn: 如果你的潜意识告诉你不要接受那份工作，那就在这天去戳穿它——注意了。

sentences.en: To heed more rational monetary considerations in the face of an unfair offer requires that you "swallow your pride".
sentences.cn: 面临一个不公平的出价时，留意更理性的金融考虑，需要你“吞下你的自尊心”。
